channel.title: Shopwont work
channel.description:
My shop wont work. Here are the codes i put in in autospawn
spawn = 569 2662 3308 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ring and Ammy Shop
In Shops.cfg
shop = 11 @red@Ammy_@blu@rings 1 1 6583 5 6731 5 6733 5 6735 5 6737 5 2550 5 1478 5 1497 5 1498 5 1499 1 1704 5 1725 5 1727 5 1729 5 1731 5 4188 5 6585 5
and in client.java
else if (NPCID == 569) { // Silver Guy PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 11; //rings and ammys }
It compiles fine, and i go to the shop area. The guy is there, and i talk to him, nothing happens. Trade him,nothing happens. What am idoing wrong? edit---- I put in quote brackets, forgot code brackets screw up tab.
